streamName.description: Name of the Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream (like walker-events)

client.description: Pre-configured AWS Firehose client instance (like new FirehoseClient(config))

region.description: AWS region for the Firehose service (like us-east-1)

config.description: AWS SDK client configuration options (like { credentials: awsCredentials })

firehose.description: AWS Firehose configuration settings (like { streamName: 'walker-events', region: 'us-east-1' })
